SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.util

Class HighScoreUtils

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.util.HighScoreUtils
public class HighScoreUtils extends Object
Provides utility methods for reading and writing high scores.

The HighScoreUtils class contains static methods for reading high scores from files, writing new high scores to files, and managing a list of high scores at different levels.

It also supports setting custom file names for testing purposes.

      Returns:
      A list of high scores read from the file

      Parameters:
      highScores - the list of existing high scores
      score - the new score to add
      Returns:
